definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: Similarly, state and county boundaries can be represented with polygons.
sentences.chinese: 类似地，州和国家边界可以用多边形表示。

sentences.english: At the moment, only the polygons pointed towards the light source will be lit.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的场景里，只有朝向光源的多边形是被照亮的。

sentences.english: A scheme of control polygon determination by the triangle convex hull is provided.
sentences.chinese: 给出了由三角形凸包确定控制多边形的方案。

sentences.english: The polygonal fault is tensional fault system with small throws, which is of nontectonic origin.
sentences.chinese: 多边形断层是一种非构造成因的断距微小的张性断层。

sentences.english: The manufacturer had an existing table with the depot polygons already defined.
sentences.chinese: 制造商有一个已经定义了维修站多边形的现成的表。

sentences.english: Use the Polygonal Lasso Tool to select and delete it.
sentences.chinese: 使用多边形套索工具选择并删除旧脑袋。

sentences.english: Consider drawing polygons tracing the edge of certain layers with heights equal to the cloud tops.
sentences.chinese: 考虑绘制跟踪高度等于云顶的特定图层边缘的多边形。

sentences.english: Next, the team built a table of the segments of the polygon.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，该团队构建了一个多边形线段表。

sentences.english: Adopting geometric method, the rational function interpolation is constructed on polygonal element.
sentences.chinese: 采用几何的方法构造出多边形单元上的有理函数插值。

sentences.english: The algorithm to apex of polygon is a new one when layout stampings optimally.
sentences.chinese: 多边形顶点算法是冲裁件优化排样的一种新算法。

sentences.english: Middle-click a vertex of the current polygon to remove it.
sentences.chinese: 中键单击顶点当前多边形将其删除。

sentences.english: How to convert GIS rasters into vector polygons?
sentences.chinese: 如何将GIS栅格到矢量多边形？

sentences.english: Triangulate partitioning polygon is geometric primitives of computational geometric.
sentences.chinese: 多边形三角剖分是计算几何的一个几何基元。

sentences.english: How to convert a polygon to a set on non-overlapping triangles?
sentences.chinese: 如何将一个多边形的一组非重叠的三角形？

sentences.english: Fills the polygonal area on the screen.
sentences.chinese: 填充屏幕上的多边形区域。

sentences.english: Next, Eric illustrates efficient set modeling techniques using both NURBS and polygons.
sentences.chinese: 其次，建模技术使用的NURBS和多边形。

pinyin: bu4 gui1 ze2 si4 bian1 xing2

definition: broken line (continuous figure made up of straight line segments)/polygonal line/dog leg
